TopicTitle: Starting a BIG, Orbit-Assembled Jool Mission

Articles.Content:
Hey everyone. My friend and I have been working on a huge Jool mission, and just started a YouTube channel to share it. We were trying to come up with the biggest challenge we could think of in KSP, and decided that a single mission that visited every body in the Jool system was a good choice. We did tons of planning and are starting to actually put stuff in orbit so we can assemble it.

Check out our first video and let us know what you think!

You can visit our channel here. If you like it we'd appreciate a subscribe. Thanks!
You guys might want to check out the Jool-5 mission. Good luck!
Oh shoot, Chris already posted in here! Sorry about the spam!

You guys might want to check out the Jool-5 mission. Good luck!

Hey Dman979, what's the Jool-5 mission? Is that like a challenge? I looked in the "Challenges" forums, but didn't find anything that looked like that. I might have just overlooked it.

Hey BrettS983 and welcome to the forums!

This is the challenge that Dman979 is referring to...

Your video looks great by the way, I will for sure be following it and see where your Jool mission goes!
Thanks for the info SpaceExplorer, we'll check it out. Glad you liked the first video, the next few are in the works.
